text: hi I am anne
Hello, I'm Rebecca, nice to meet you
would you like to donate a part of your earnings to Save the Children fund?
Sure, what did you have in mind?
I will give you a choice to make your own decision on how much to donate
What do you think would be a fair amount to donate?
How much are you comfortable with to donate to this cause?
I am not sure yet. What does Save the Children do?
It is an organization that helps children around the world with food, clothing , water, education, medical help
That sounds like a good cause. Have you donated to them before?
Yes. So far I have given the organization $100 this year
Do you donate to any other sorts of charities?
yes, but for the time being, you can donate up to $2 to save the children, How much would you like to donate?
Do you think it would be fair if I donated $1?
That is great and your donation would be directly deducted from your task payment.
OK, I feel comfortable donating $1.
thanks, and I appreciate you donating the $1 to the organization
Thank you, I hope it is helpful.
Everyone who donates will make a collective effort in making an impact. Thanks
I'm glad to hear that, with a lot of people doing a little a big difference can be made.
